name: biomni-query-cbioportal
title: Biomni: Query Cbioportal
description: Query the cBioPortal for Cancer Genomics to access multidimensional cancer genomics data from large-scale studies.
content:
Overview

Queries cBioPortal, a comprehensive resource containing genomic data from thousands of cancer studies including TCGA, ICGC, and institutional cohorts. Provides access to mutations, copy number alterations, gene expression, methylation, and clinical data across multiple cancer types.

Input Parameters

  • prompt (string, optional): Natural language query about cancer genomics (e.g., "Find BRCA1 mutations in breast cancer")
  • endpoint (string, optional): Specific REST API endpoint to query directly
  • verbose (boolean, optional): Enable detailed logging output (default: true)

Biological Use Case

Critical for cancer genomics research, enabling identification of driver mutations, biomarker discovery, comparing genomic alterations across cancer types, understanding tumor heterogeneity, and informing precision oncology approaches. Researchers use cBioPortal to investigate mutation frequencies, identify co-occurring alterations, analyze survival correlations, and discover therapeutic targets.

Output

Returns a parameters (cbioportal_results.json) containing genomic alterations, mutation details, copy number data, expression values, clinical annotations, and study metadata. Results include variant classifications, allele frequencies, and patient-level data when available.
